name: telus-thorium-core
description: The Telus Styleguide and UI Library

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && npm run build:thorium && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:css: npm run lint:css && npm run build:thorium:css && npm run build:docs:css
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs:css && npm run build:docs:html
scripts.build:docs:css: node-sass --include-path docs/assets/scss docs/assets/scss/main.scss | postcss --use autoprefixer | cleancss > docs/assets/css/styleguide.css
scripts.build:thorium:css: node-sass --include-path scss scss/thorium.scss | postcss --use autoprefixer | cleancss > dist/thorium.css && cp dist/thorium.css docs/assets/css
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/**/* && rm -f docs/assets/css/thorium.css && rm -f docs/assets/css/styleguide.css

author: Telus Digital
